35b2('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid
35b3('bum): la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
35b4('bum): pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas
35b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mngon par shes pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang
35b6('bum): mnyam pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dper na nam mkha' l-i ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus myi dmigs te/mtha'
35b7('bum): yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin du mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par
36a1('bum): shes pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs
36a2('bum): so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
36a3('bum): par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer
36a4('bum): ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi
36a5('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do//
36a6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
36a7('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des ni ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha'
36b1('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
36b2('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/de ci'i
36b3('bum): phyir zhe na/'di ltar dper na/nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas
36b4('bum): papo'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi
36b5('bum): dmigs/phyi mu'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs
36b6('bum): des na gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/de bzhin gshegs
36b7('bum): pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs
37a1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mo dmigs/phyi ma'i
37a2('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mtha' yas kun tu mtha' mos pa'i phyir/nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
37a3('bum): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus
37a4('bum): mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu
37a5('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/mi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir
37a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mi 'jigs pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/
37a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mtha' yas kun tu
37b1('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi
37b2('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam
37b3('bum): grangs des na mi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/so so yang
37b4('bum): dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes ze ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/so so yang dag
37b5('bum): par rig pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam po ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs//
37b6('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dri bzhin du so so yang dag
37b7('bum): par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid
38a1('bum): la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na/so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o
38a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
38a3('bum): sngon tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ljon pa shA rarAdwa ti'i bu/snying rje chen pa ni num mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/do ci'i phyir zhin/'di ltar
38a4('bum): dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas po'i phyir nam mkha'
38a5('bum): zhes ming du brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin du snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'
38a6('bum): mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na snying rje chen po kun tu
38a7('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu
38b1('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni
38b2('bum): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te
38b3('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
38b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs
38b5('bum): so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
38b6('bum): par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bo de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs/tshor ba byang
38b7('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs/'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ong med cing mi dmigs/'du byed byang chub sems
39a1('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs zhes zer ba
39a2('bum): ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zho na/stong pa nyid la gzugs med byang chub sems dpa' med do//rgyu dang
39a3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs nges na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i
39a4('bum): phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la tshor ba med byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ljon pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
39a5('bum): bo de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'du shes med byang chub sems dpa' med do//
39a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong
39a7('bum): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'du byed med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na 'du byed byang chub
39b1('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa med byang
39b2('bum): chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe
39b3('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang mig ni mig gis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong po nyid la mig med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA
39b4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/mig byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba ni rno bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid
39b5('bum): la rna ba med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rna ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs
39b6('bum): so//sna ni snas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la sna med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sna byang
39b7('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing ma dmigs so//lce ni lhos stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la lce med/byang chub sems dpa' med do///
40a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA rAdwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lho byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//lus ni lus kyis
40a2('bum): stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la lus med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lus byang chub
40a3('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//yid ni yid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la yid med/byang chub sems
40a4('bum): dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ya byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa
40a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la gzugs med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang
40a6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med tsang ma dmigs so//sgra ni sgras stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe
40a7('bum): na/stong pa nyid la sgra med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sgra byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
40b1('bum): bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//dri ni dris stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la dri med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
40b2('bum): grangs des na/dri byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//ro ni ros stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ro med/byang chub
40b3('bum): sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ro byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//reg ni rog gis
40b4('bum): stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la reg myed/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/reg byang chub sems
40b5('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//chos ni chos kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la chos med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang/
40b6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/chos byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan po shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang mig gi
40b7('bum): rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la mig gi rnam par shes pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang
41a1('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/mig gri rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//na
41a2('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//
41a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par
41a4('bum): shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la sna'i rnam par shes po med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa
41a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sna'i rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i
41a6('bum): rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
41a7('bum): rnam grangs des na/lce'i rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med ci ngo mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni/lus kyi
41b1('bum): rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par shes pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
41b2('bum): grangs des na/lus kyi rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas
41b3('bum): stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes po med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/yid
41b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes po byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig
41b5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
41b6('bum): grangs des na/mig gi 'dus te reg po byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas
41b7('bum): stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rna ba'i 'dus te reg po med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/
42a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus
42a2('bum): reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la sna'i 'dus te reg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu rnam grangs
42a3('bum): des na/sna'i 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste//
42a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la lce'i 'dus te reg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lce'i 'dus
42a5('bum): te rig po byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na//
42a6('bum): stong pa nyid la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lus kyi 'dus tau reg pa
42a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na
42b1('bum): stong pa nyid la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/yid kyi 'dus te rnyog pa byang chub sems
42b2('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg
42b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa
42b4('bum): shA rA dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg
42b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/byang chub
42b6('bum): sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi
42b7('bum): dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid lo sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
43a1('bum): gyis tshor ba mod/byang chub snyoms dpa' myong do//tshe dang ldan pa shA rAdwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang
43a2('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste//de
43a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lce'i
43a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang medro cing mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te
43a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//che
43a6('bum): dradang ldan po shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//
43a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
43b1('bum): gyis tshor ba med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes/
43b2('bum): bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'o bu gzhan yang sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la sa'i
43b3('bum): khokhams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing
43b4('bum): mi dmigs so//chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la chu'i khams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA
43b5('bum): rarAdwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na chu'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir
43b6('bum): zhe na /stong pa nyid la me'i khams med/byang chub sems dpa' mod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/me'i khams byang chub sems dpa'
43b7('bum): zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rlung gi kha mos med/byang chub
44a1('bum): sems dpa' mong ngo do//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rlung gi khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs
44a2('bum): so//nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la nam mkha'i khams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//
44a3('bum): drang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/nam mkha'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams
44a4('bum): ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rnam par shes po'i khams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa
44a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
44a6('bum): gzhan yang ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe no/stong pa nyid la ma rig pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i
44a7('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
44b1('bum): stong pa nyid lnga 'du byed med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
44b2('bum): bu'ang med ning mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa med/byang chub sems dpa'
44b3('bum): med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs
44b4('bum): ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ming dang gzugs med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
44b5('bum): grangs des na/ming dang gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigaso so//skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe
44b6('bum): na/stong pa nyid la skye mched drug mod/byang chub sems dpa'i med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/skye mched drug byang chub sems dpa'o zhes
44b7('bum): bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la reg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa
45a1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/de ci
45a2('bum): phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la tshor ba med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
45a3('bum): de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la sred pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA
45a4('bum): radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sred pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//len po ni len pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa
45a5('bum): nyid la len pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/len pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing
45a6('bum): mi dmigs so//srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la srid pa myed/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe drang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
45a7('bum): grangs des na/srid pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//skyo ba ni skye bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la
45b1('bum): skye ba med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/skyo ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs/
45b2('bum): so/rga shi nr-i rga shis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rga shri med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
45b3('bum): des na/rga shi byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/dri ci'i
45b4('bum): phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
45b5('bum): pos stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu
45b6('bum): byin pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson
45b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste//de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//bsam gtan gyi pha
46a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/byang
46a2('bum): chub sems dpa' med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
46a3('bum): pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ljon pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa
46a4('bum): nyid la nang stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid
46a5('bum): med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid med/byang
46a6('bum): chub sems dpa' med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis sbyong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong po nyid med/byang chub sems
46a7('bum): dpa' med do//chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa'
46b1('bum): med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med
46b2('bum): do//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//
46b3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byos stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med
46b4('bum): do//mtho' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'odas pa stong pa nyid med//
46b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la thog
46b6('bum): mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na//
46b7('bum): stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na
47a1('bum): stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong
47a2('bum): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan
47a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//mi dmigs pa stong
47a4('bum): pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//
47a5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med/byang chub
47a6('bum): sems dpa' med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/byang
47a7('bum): chub sems dpa' med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong
47b1('bum): pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag
47b2('bum): pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar byazhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la blun pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med/byang chub sems dpa'
47b3('bum): med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la yang dag par spong ba rnams med/byang
47b4('bum): chung sems dpa' med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med/
47b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' med do//dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la dbang po rnams med/byang chub sems
47b6('bum): dpa' med do//stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la stobs rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//byang
47b7('bum): nub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan log rnams med/byang chub sems
48a1('bum): dpa' med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid
48a2('bum): la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i
48a3('bum): phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//bsam gtan rnams na bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i
48a4('bum): phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
48a5('bum): stong pa nyid la tshad med pa rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
48a6('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la gzugs meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//rnam par thar pa
48a7('bum): brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa brgyad med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//mthar gyis gnas
48b1('bum): de'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong ste/do ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la mthar gyis gnas pa'o snyoms par
48b2('bum): 'jug pa dgu med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
48b3('bum): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
48b4('bum): smon pa med pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la mngon
48b5('bum): par shes pa rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin
48b6('bum): rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//gzungs kyi sgro rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis sbyong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la gzungs kyi sgo rnams med//
48b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la de
49a1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/
49a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la mi 'jigs pa rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa
49a3('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen
49a4('bum): pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe no//stong pa nyid la snying rje chen po med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi
49a5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//chos kyi
49a6('bum): dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin
49a7('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la de bzhin nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' mod do//yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas
49b1('bum): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong ba nyid la yang dag pa'i mtha' mod/byang chub sems dpa' mod do//bsam myos mo khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab par
49b2('bum): dbyings kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad
49b3('bum): shos pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam
49b4('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir na ni/stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni
49b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//nyan thos kyi
49b6('bum): theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang
49b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs
50a1('bum): /rgyus kyi theg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//nyan thos ni nyan thAs/
50a2('bum): kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la nyan thos med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyong ste/de ci'i phyir
50a3('bum): zhe na/stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas med/byang chub sems dpa' med do//de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong
50a4('bum): pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa med/byang chubo sems dpa' med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
50a5('bum): pa de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
50a6('bum): de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes
50a7('bum): bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gong yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam
50b1('bum): pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni grang zhig/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes
50b2('bum): zer ba ci'i phyir de skad smras zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs ni tshor ba la med tsong mi
50b3('bum): dmigs so//tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing
50b4('bum): mi dmigs so//'du shes ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so//'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du
50b5('bum): shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba
50b6('bum): dang 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par
50b7('bum): shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so//
51a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mige ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so//mig ni rna ba la med cing me dmigs so//rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi
51a2('bum): dmigs so//rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so//mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so//sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so//sna ni mig dang rna ba
51a3('bum): la med cing mi dmigs so//mig dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so//lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so//lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med
51a4('bum): cing mi dmigs so//mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so//lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so//lus ni mig dang rna ba dang
51a5('bum): sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so//mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so//yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so//
51a6('bum): yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs ni sgra la med cing
51a7('bum): mi dmigs so//sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so//sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so//dri/
51b1('bum): ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so//dri ni gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so//ro ni ro la med cing mi dmigs/
51b2('bum): so//ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs dang sgra dang dI dang ro ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so//reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so///
51b3('bum): rAg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so//chos ni chos la med cing
51b4('bum): mi dmigs so//chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dI dang ro dang rig la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gri rnam par shes pa la med cing mi
51b5('bum): dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi
51b6('bum): dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam
51b7('bum): par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par
52a1('bum): shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna
52a2('bum): rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par
52a3('bum): shes pa ni/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes
52a4('bum): pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//
52a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam
52a6('bum): par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par
52a7('bum): shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs
52b1('bum): so/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam
52b2('bum): pAr shes pa dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni
52b3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
52b4('bum): ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa
52b5('bum): dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sna'i
52b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te rig pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
52b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg
53a1('bum): pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te rnyog pa dang //
53a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lha'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
53a3('bum): ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa
53a4('bum): dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang lce'i 'dus
53a5('bum): te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la
53a6('bum): med cing mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te
53a7('bum): reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
53b1('bum): tshor ba la mod cang mo dmigs so//mag glo 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmyigs so//rna ba dang /
53b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bu ni rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus
53b3('bum): te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni
53b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la
53b5('bum): mid cing mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
53b6('bum): la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
53b7('bum): ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
54a1('bum): tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg/
54a2('bum): pa las byung ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg
54a3('bum): pa las byung ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la
54a4('bum): med cing mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//lus kyi
54a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byang ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba
54a6('bum): dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
54a7('bum): ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus
54b1('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmyigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs/
54b2('bum): so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te rAg pA las byung ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
54b3('bum): byung ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so////shes rab kyi pha rol tu
54b4('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po gya gcig pa//sa'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//sa'i khams ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//
54b5('bum): chu'i khams ni chu'i khams lnga med cing mi dmigs so//chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//sa'i khams dang chu'i khams ni me'i khams la med
54b6('bum): cod mi dmigs so//me'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//me'i khams ni sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//sa'i
54b7('bum): khams dang /chu'i khams dang me'i khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so//rlung gi
55a1('bum): khams ni sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /mo'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//sa'i khams dang /rgyu'i khams dang mo'i khams/
55a2('bum): dang /rlung gi khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i
55a3('bum): khams ni so'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so//su'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /
55a4('bum): me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam
55a5('bum): par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi
55a6('bum): khams dang /nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so//ma rig pa ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so//ma rig pa ni 'du byed la med cing mi
55a7('bum): dmigs so//'du byed ni 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so//'du byed ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dang 'du byed ni rnam par
55b1('bum): shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa dang /'du byed la med cing mi
55b2('bum): dmigs so//ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs na ming dang gzugs la med cing mi
55b3('bum): dmigs so//ming dang gzugs ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang //
55b4('bum): ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so//skye mched drug ni skye mched drug la med cing ma dmigs so//skye mched drug ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed
55b5('bum): dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigaso so//ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skyo
55b6('bum): mched drug ni reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//reg pa ni reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//reg pa ni ma rig pa dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming/
55b7('bum): dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug
56a1('bum): dang reg pa ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmyigs so//tshor ba ni ma rig pa dang /'du byed dang rnam
56a2('bum): par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /
56a3('bum): ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang tshor ba ni sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sred pa ni sred pa la med cing ma dmigs so//sred
56a4('bum): pa ni ma rig pa dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs
56a5('bum): so//ma rig pa dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa ni len pa la med
56a6('bum): cing mi dmigs so//len po ni len pa la med cing mi dmigs so//len pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byud dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang
56a7('bum): skye mched drug dang reg pa dang /tshor ba dang sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /
56b1('bum): skye mchod drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang srod pa dang /lon pa ni srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so//srid pa ni srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so//srid pa ni ma rig pa dang /
56b2('bum): 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang tshor ba dang /sred pa dang len pa la med cing mi dmigs so//ma
56b3('bum): rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang /srid pa ni skye ba la med
56b4('bum): cing mi dmigs so//skye ba ni skye ba la med cing mi dmigs so//skye ba ni mo rig pa dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched
56b5('bum): drug dang /reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang /srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so//ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs
56b6('bum): skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang /srid pa dang skye ba ni rga shi la med cing ma dmigs so//rga shi ni rga shi la med cing mi dmigs
56b7('bum): so//rga shi ni ma rig pa dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugaso dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang /len pa
57a1('bum): dang /sdod pa dang /skyo ba la mod cing mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i phyi rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i'o pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mo dmigs so//
57a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
57a3('bum): mod cing mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
57a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs
57a5('bum): so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
57a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
57a7('bum): ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
57b1('bum): tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
57b2('bum): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/bsam gtan
57b3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
57b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
57b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//shes
57b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha
57b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//nang
58a1('bum): stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmyigs so//phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa
58a2('bum): nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la med
58a3('bum): cing mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong po nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs
58a4('bum): so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa
58a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//
58a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid
58a7('bum): nichen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong
58b1('bum): pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid ni don dam
58b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid na nang stong pa nyid dang
58b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang /
58b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/'dus byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//'dus
58b5('bum): byos stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong
58b6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid
58b7('bum): dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so///
59a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid
59a2('bum): dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong po nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la myed cing mi dmyigs
59a3('bum): so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa
59a4('bum): nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong bya nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//mtha' lngas 'das pa stong
59a5('bum): bya nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang
59a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la
59a7('bum): med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid
59b1('bum): dang /dron dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus mu byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa
59b2('bum): stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog mya dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med
59b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang //
59b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa
59b5('bum): nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma
59b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//dor
59b7('bum): bo med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /
60a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus
60a2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi

60a5('bum): stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /
60a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang //

60b1('bum): dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
60b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa
60b3('bum): nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la med cing
60b4('bum): mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong
60b5('bum): pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma
60b6('bum): myemed pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la medo cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang
60b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
61a1('bum): /dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
61a2('bum): dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
61a3('bum): la med cing mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /

61a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhini stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs
61a6('bum): so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid
61a7('bum): dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor
61b1('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi
61b2('bum): dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid
61b3('bum): dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas
61b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos
61b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong
61b6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das
61b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang
62a1('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa
62a2('bum): nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa
62a3('bum): nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
62a4('bum): dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos
62a5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid
62a6('bum): dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma
62a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong
62b1('bum): nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ngo bo nyid
62b2('bum): stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/nang stong pa nyid
62b3('bum): dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong
62b4('bum): pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog mA dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med bya stong pa nyid dang /
62b5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong
62b6('bum): pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /
62b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa
63a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
63a2('bum): nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med
63a3('bum): cacing mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo
63a4('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam
63a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
63a6('bum): pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi
63a7('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni
63b1('bum): don pa nyo bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs s+ho//yang dag par spong //
63b2('bum): ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//dran pa
63b3('bum): nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
63b4('bum): rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar
63b5('bum): bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams la med
63b6('bum): cing ming dmigs so//dbang po rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par sbyong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//dran pa nye
63b7('bum): bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po rnams ni/stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//stobs rnams ni stobs
64a1('bum): rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//stobs rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang //
64a2('bum): po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs rnams ni//
64a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi
64a4('bum): yan lag rnams ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs
64a5('bum): so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni lam la
64a6('bum): med cing mi dmigs so//lam ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so//lam ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang
64a7('bum): dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi
64b1('bum): dmigs so//'phags pa'i bangon pa rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la mod cing mi dmigs so//bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs
64b2('bum): so/bsam gtan rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la
64b3('bum): med cing mi dmigs so//tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//tshad med pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan rnams
64b4('bum): la med cing mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi
64b5('bum): dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms
64b6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam
64b7('bum): gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa rnams ni
65a1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /
65a2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med
65a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas
65a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
65a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar
65a6('bum): parnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad myed pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam
65a7('bum): par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams
65b1('bum): ni/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad yod pa
65b2('bum): dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//
65b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis
65b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni/mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams ni
65b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs
65b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi
65b7('bum): dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /
66a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ting nge 'dzin rnams la med
66a2('bum): cing mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam
66a3('bum): gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
66a4('bum): dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa
66a5('bum): dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /
66a6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
66a7('bum): med cing mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang //bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
66b1('bum): 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin
66b2('bum): rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin
66b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//mi
66b4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni so so/
66b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la med tsang mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//so/
66b6('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
66b7('bum): dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so//byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po la med cing
67a1('bum): mi dmigs so//byams pa chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi
67a2('bum): dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'dzugs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po na snying rje chen po la med cing mi
67a3('bum): dmigs so//snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so
67a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mI 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag
67a5('bum): par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
67a6('bum): 'dres pa rnams ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
67a7('bum): dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so//rigs kyi sa'i chos
67b1('bum): rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rigs kyi sa'i chos ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la myed cing mi dmigs so//brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni brgyad
67b2('bum): pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos la med cing mi dmigs so//rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /brgyad pa'i chos rnams
67b3('bum): ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs
67b4('bum): pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rigs kyi sa'i chos dang brgyad pa'i chos dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos
67b5('bum): rnams ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs
67b6('bum): so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /brgyad pa'i chos dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rigs kyi sa'i
67b7('bum): chos dang /brgyad pa'i chos dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//phyir mi
68a1('bum): 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /brgyad
68a2('bum): pa'i chos dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /brgyad pa'i chos dang
68a3('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//dgra
68a4('bum): bcom pa'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /brgyad pa'i chos dang /rgyun
68a5('bum): du zhugs pa'i chos dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa la
68a6('bum): med cing mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la mod cing mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs
68a7('bum): so//brgyad pa'i sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//brgyad pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i so dang /rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so//so so'i skye
68b1('bum): bo'i sa dang /rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//mthong ba'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//mthong ba'i sa
68b2('bum): ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang /rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i
68b3('bum): sa la med cing mi dmigs so//bsgrubs pa'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//bsrabs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang /rigs kyis dang brgyad pa'i
68b4('bum): sa dang /mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong po'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa ni 'dod chags
68b5('bum): dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa
68b6('bum): ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang /
68b7('bum): brgyad pa'i so dang mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//byas pa rtogs pa'i sa
69a1('bum): ma brgyags pa'os la myod na ma migs su//b+has ga rmugs pa nams bru~Ms+yA ng+gA/rigs d+d+hi sa dang ban+d+had pa'i sna dang nga
69a2('bum): ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so//sa ma'i skye bo'i sa dang /rigs kyis dang /brgyad pa'i
69a3('bum): dang mthong ba'i sa dang /bslabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa no//rlung sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs
