261b5('bum): yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//lam gyi
261b6('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/rnam pa
261b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs
262a1('bum): su ma rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya bar yongs su rma rtag go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug
262a2('bum): ces bya ba dang /mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/rnam pa tham
262a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon po yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya
262a4('bum): bar yongs su mi rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang /mazhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang /mau ldan
262a5('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go//'di lta ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos 'di
262a6('bum): dag li ltar yongs su rtog pa med pa'i tshul gyis/de ltar yongs su rtog go///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po dgu bcu pa//smras pa che
262a7('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/de skad du/gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma yin/tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/tshor ba ma yin/'du she
262b1('bum): kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/'du shes ma yin/'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/'du byed ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa
262b2('bum): ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/mig gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mig ma yin/rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba ma yin/sna'i
262b3('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/sna ma yin/lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/lce ma yin/lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/lus ma yin/yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni///
262b4('bum): yod ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma yin/sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/sgra ma
262b5('bum): yin/dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/dri ma yin/ro'i mi skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ro ma yin/reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/reg ma yin/chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
262b6('bum): pa de ni/chos ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/rna ba'i
262b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/lce'i rnam/
263a1('bum): par shes pa'i mi skyes pa gang yin pa ni/kye'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pad ni/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma
263a2('bum): yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/mig gi 'dus te
263a3('bum): reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg
263a4('bum): pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma
263a5('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab
263a6('bum): 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/mig gI 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mu skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te
263a7('bum): rerig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pade
263b1('bum): nIni/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bu'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/lus
263b2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin
263b3('bum): papA da ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/sa'i khams ma
263b4('bum): yin/chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/chu'i khams ma yin/me'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/me'i khams ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
263b5('bum): pa de ni/rlung gi khams ma yin/nam mkha'i khams kyi me skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/nam mkha'i khams ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam
263b6('bum): par shes pa'i khams ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ma rig pa ma yin/'du byed kyi ma skyes
263b7('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/'du byed ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i mi skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ming dang
264a1('bum): gzugs ma yin/skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/skye mched drug ma yin/reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/reg pa ma yin/tshor ba'i ma skyes pa
264a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni/tshor ba ma yin/sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/sred pa ma yin/len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/len pa ma yin/srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa
264a3('bum): de ni/srid pa ma yin/skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/skye ba ma yin/rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rga shi ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/
264a4('bum): de skad du/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/tshul khrims
264a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin
264a6('bum): pa de ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes rab kyi
264a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/nang stong pa nyid kyi ma
264b1('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/nang stong pa nyid ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/phyi nang stong pa nyid ma
264b2('bum): yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/don dam pastong
264b3('bum): pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
264b4('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma
264b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/rang
264b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/rang gi
264b7('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma
265a1('bum): yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ngo bo
265a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes ze re/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i
265a3('bum): phyir na/de skad du/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
265a4('bum): ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
265a5('bum): ni/dbang po rnams ma yin/stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/stobs rnams ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/byang chub kyi yan
265a6('bum): lag rnams ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma
265a7('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gtan rnams ma yin/tshad med pa rnams kyi ma
265b1('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/tshad med pa rnams ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin//
265b2('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mthar gyis
265b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par thar pa'i
265b4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
265b5('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi
265b6('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/so so yang dag
265b7('bum): par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/byams pa chen po ma yin/snying rje chen
266a1('bum): po ma skyes pa gang yin pa ni/snying rje chen po ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
266a2('bum): ma yin zhes zer/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/de skad du/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa
266a3('bum): shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
266a4('bum): nyid ma yin zhes zor/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang
266a5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/tshor ba ni tshar bas stong ste/gang stong pa de
266a6('bum): nI tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'du shes
266a7('bum): ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni 'du shes ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma
266b1('bum): na / dz+nyAn du /gas+hos du byung ba rgyu da//da na shU gyi'i burnam tha dun
266b2('bum): kyimi skyes pa gang yin byed 'du byed ma yin no//tshe dang ljon pa shwA radwa ti'i bri/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do//
266b3('bum): dang ldan pa shA rA ti'i burnam gro sangs na/rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no//rdo dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mig ni mig gis stong /
266b4('bum): stong pa de ni mig ma yin te skyo ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/mig gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mig ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rna ba ni na
266b5('bum): dus sbyong ste/gang stong pa de ni rnab ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shrI ra
266b6('bum): ti'i bu/sku ni sngas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni sna ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sna'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de snga ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa
266b7('bum): shA radwa ti'i bu/lce ni lces stong ste/gang snying pa de ni lha mo yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sgo'i ma skyes pa gang yin pang /lce ma yin no//
267a1('bum): de dang ldan pa shA r+ya ti'i bu/lus na lus rgyas snang ste/ga sbyang ba ni las ma yin te sgrub ma da//cha dang ldan pa shU rAr+ya tI'i thunam grangs des na/lus ca
267a2('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de lus ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/yid ni yid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni yid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
267a3('bum): grangs des na/yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong so/gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba med
267a4('bum): do//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/sgra ni sgras sbyong ste/gang stong pa de ni
267a5('bum): sku ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dri ni dris stong ste/gang stong
267a6('bum): pa de ni dri ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/dri'o ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ra ni ros stong ste//
267a7('bum): gang stong pa de ni ro ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ro'i me skyes pa gang yin pa de ro ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/reg ni rig
267b1('bum): gis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni reg ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rog gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//
267b2('bum): chos ni chos kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni chos ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa
267b3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa snga stong ste/gang stong pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs

267b5('bum): stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam
267b6('bum): par shes pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do//
267b7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/lce'i rnam par
268a1('bum): shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lce

268b2('bum): reg pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa

268b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do//
268b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i me skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/yid kyi 'dus
268b7('bum): tereg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/yid kyi 'dus te reg
269a1('bum): pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA rarA dwa ti'i bu/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa
269a2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/mig gi 'dus

269a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang
269a7('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//tshe dang ldan
269b1('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med
269b2('bum): do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//tshe dang ldan
269b3('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye
269b4('bum): ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i me skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//
269b5('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
269b6('bum): ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
269b7('bum): tshor nga ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
270a1('bum): tI'i bu rnam grangs des na/sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/sa'i khams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/
270a2('bum): gang stong pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan
270a3('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni me'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/me'o
270a4('bum): khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de me'i khams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rlung gi
270a5('bum): khams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa grang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa
270a6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa dri ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
270a7('bum): grangs des na/nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par
270b1('bum): shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes
270b2('bum): pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/grang stong pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan
270b3('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/grang stong pa de ni
270b4('bum): 'du byed ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu rnam grangs des na/'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam
270b5('bum): par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa
270b6('bum): gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin te skye ba
270b7('bum): med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ming dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ming dang gzugs ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/skye mched
271a1('bum): drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/skye mchod drug gi ma
271a2('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA
271a3('bum): radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma
271a4('bum): yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/tshor ba'i mu skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sred pa ni sred pas stong
271a5('bum): ste/gang stong pa de ni sred pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA
271a6('bum): radwa ti'i bu/len pa ni len pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni len pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa
271a7('bum): de len pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/srid pa ni srid pas stong ste//gang stong pa de ni srid pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
271b1('bum): des na/srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni skye ba ma yin te skye ba med do/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i/
271b2('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rga shi na rga shis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rga shi ma yin te skye ba med do/tshe dang
271b3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong
271b4('bum): ste/gang stong pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi skyes pa gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha
271b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
271b6('bum): yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan
271b7('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa/
272a1('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/brtson 'grus
272a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na//
272a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam
272a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/bsam gtan
272a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i me skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
272a6('bum): pas stong ste/gang stong po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa
272a7('bum): gang yin pa de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid
272b1('bum): ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/phyi skyong
272b2('bum): pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/phyi stong pa nyid kyi me skyes pa gang yin pa de
272b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang
272b4('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong
272b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes
272b6('bum): pa gang yin pa de/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni chen po stong pa
272b7('bum): nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa
273a1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA
273a2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus
273a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
273a4('bum): gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong
273a5('bum): pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes po gang yin pa de/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe
273a6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba
273a7('bum): med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang
273b1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//
273b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu rnam grangs nges na/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi me skyes pa gang yin pa de/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa
273b3('bum): radwa ti'i bu/der ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
273b4('bum): grangs des na/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ring bzhin stong pa nyid
273b5('bum): kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/rang
273b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa
273b7('bum): nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no//
274a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang skyong pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/
274a2('bum): te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang
274a3('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong po de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA
274a4('bum): radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dngos po med
274a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/
274a6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong
274a7('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang
274b1('bum): yin pade/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//rdo dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa nga ba nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/glang stong pa
274b2('bum): de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu rnam grangs des na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de//
274b3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni dran
274b4('bum): panye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
274b5('bum): rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan po shA radwa ti'i bu/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin
274b6('bum): te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mu skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA
274b7('bum): rarAdwa ti'i bu/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA rang
275a1('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dbang /
275a2('bum): po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang
275a3('bum): yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang
275a4('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang
275a5('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub kyi yan
275a6('bum): lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'phags pa'i lam yan lagrwa brgyad pa ni/'phags pa'i
275a7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/'phags
275b1('bum): 'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/'phags
275b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
275b3('bum): kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni
275b4('bum): bas mo gtan rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/bsam gtan rnams ma yin no//
275b5('bum): tshatshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni tshad med pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
275b6('bum): grangs des na/tshad med pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/tshad med pa rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
275b7('bum): ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA
276a1('bum): rad+ya ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma
276a2('bum): yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/gong stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa
276a3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi me skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mthar gyis gnas pa'i
276a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin
276a5('bum): te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/mthar gyis gnas pa'i
276a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mo med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i
276a7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma yin te
276b1('bum): skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/rnam par thar pa'i
276b2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa da/smon pa med pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong
276b3('bum): pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mngon par shes
276b4('bum): pa rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa tI'i bu/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang
276b5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ga zungs
276b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes
276b7('bum): pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong /
277a1('bum): ste/gang stong pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
277a2('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong
277a3('bum): pa de ni mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin
277a4('bum): no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/
277a5('bum): skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no//tshe
277a6('bum): dodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong ste/gang stong pa de ni byams pa chen po mA yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges
277a7('bum): na/byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/gang stong pa de ni snying rje chen
277b1('bum): po ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu rnam grangs des na/snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sangs rgyas kyi
277b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
277b3('bum): grangs des na/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/thams cad shes pa nyid ni
277b4('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes
277b5('bum): pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni lam gyi rnam
277b6('bum): pa shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no//
277b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/gang stong pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba
278a1('bum): med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//smras pa/
278a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir nu de skad du/gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/tshor ba ma yin/'du shes kyi 'grib pa
278a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni/'du shes ma yin/'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/'du byed ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa ma yin/mig gi/
278a4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/mig ma yin/rno ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba ma yin/sna'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sna ma yin/lce'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/lce ma
278a5('bum): yin/lus kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/lus ma yin/yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/yid ma yin/gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma yin/sgra'i
278a6('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sgra ma yin/dri'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/dri ma yin/ro'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ro ma yin/reg gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/reg ma
278a7('bum): yin/chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/chos ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes
278b1('bum): 'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang
278b2('bum): yin pa de ni/lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa grang
278b3('bum): yin pa de ni/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa
278b4('bum): de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/lce'i 'dus
278b5('bum): te reg pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/yid kyi 'dus te
278b6('bum): rig pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
278b7('bum): tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sna'i 'dus te reg
279a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/lus kyi
279a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang
279a3('bum): yin pa de ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sa'i khams ma yin/chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de
279a4('bum): ni/chu'i khams ma yin/me'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/me'i khams ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rlung gi khams ma yin/nam
279a5('bum): mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/nam mkha'i khams ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ma
279a6('bum): rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ma rig pa ma yin/'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/'du byed ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par
279a7('bum): shes pa ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ming dang gzugs ma yin/skye mched drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/skye mched drug ma yin/reg
279b1('bum): pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/reg pa ma yin/tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/tshor ba ma yin/sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sred pa ma yin/len pa'i 'grib pa gang
279b2('bum): yin pa de ni/len pa ma yin/srid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/srid pa ma yin/skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/skye ba ma yin/rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rga shi
279b3('bum): ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/tshul khrims kyi pha
279b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/brtson
279b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa
279b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/nang stong pa nyid ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/phyi stong
279b7('bum): pa nyid ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/chen
280a1('bum): pastong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/'dus byas/
280a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/mtha' las
280a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de no/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mo yin/thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib po gang yin pa de ni/zlog ma dang tham med
280a4('bum): bstong pa nyid ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa da ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rang bzhin
280a5('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rlung
280a6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/mi dmigs pa snang ba nyid ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin
280a7('bum): pa de ni/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
280b1('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin/yang dag
280b2('bum): par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin//
280b3('bum): dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/dbang po rnams ma yin/stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/stobs rnams ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib
280b4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin//
280b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gtan rnams ma yin//
280b6('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/tshad med pa rnams ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs med pa'i snyoms
280b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
281a1('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
281a2('bum): pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni//
281a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/gzungs
281a4('bum): kyi sgo rnams ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib
281a5('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/byams
281a6('bum): pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/byams pa chen po ma yin/snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/snying rje chen po ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
281a7('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/
281b1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
281b2('bum): panyid ma yin zhes zer////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po go gcig pa//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'di ltar
281b3('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /tshor ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin/
281b4('bum): pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /'du shes gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /'du byed gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar
281b5('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan/
281b6('bum): pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin pa dang /mig gang yin pa dang /
281b7('bum): gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /sna gang
282a1('bum): yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /lce gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa
282a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /lus gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /yid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i
282a3('bum): chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o///
282a4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa dang gzugs gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /sgra gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin
282a5('bum): pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /dri gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /ro gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med
282a6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /reg gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /chos gang yin pa dang /gnyis
282a7('bum): su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan
282b1('bum): nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rna
282b2('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang
282b3('bum): yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes
282b4('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos
282b5('bum): de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//
282b6('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /mig gri 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa/
282b7('bum): dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang
283a1('bum): yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin//
283a2('bum): pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad
283a3('bum): kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin
283a4('bum): pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
283a5('bum): gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib po gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis
283a6('bum): su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib
283a7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus
283b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa
283b2('bum): thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin pa dang /sa'i khams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang //
283b3('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /chu'i khams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /me'i khams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar
283b4('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /nam mkha'i khams
283b5('bum): gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag
283b6('bum): thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang
283b7('bum): yin pa dang /mi rig pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /'du byed gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin
284a1('bum): pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /ming dang gzugs
284a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /skye mched drug gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang
284a3('bum): yin pa dang /reg pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /tshor ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /
284a4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /snyed pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /len pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang
284a5('bum): yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /srid pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /skye ba gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar
284a6('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rga shi gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan
284a7('bum): pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
284b1('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib
284b2('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su
284b3('bum): byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /shes
284b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs
284b5('bum): pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa
284b6('bum): gang yin pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid grong yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med
284b7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /chen po stong
285a1('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis sa byu med pa glang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byur med pa gang yin/
285a2('bum): pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin
285a3('bum): padang /gnyis su byur med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa
285a4('bum): gang yin pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa
285a5('bum): dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byer med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin
285a6('bum): pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis
285a7('bum): su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /mo dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /
285b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar myed pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa glang
285b2('bum): yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin//
285b3('bum): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
285b4('bum): rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib
285b5('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su
285b6('bum): byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa glang yin pa dang /stobs rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub kyi
285b7('bum): yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang /gnyis
286a1('bum): su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa
286a2('bum): gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar
286a3('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin
286a4('bum): pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams grang
286a5('bum): yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa gang yin pa
286a6('bum): dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa glang yin pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang
286a7('bum): yin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su
286b1('bum): byobyar med pa gang yin pa'i chos dri dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par
286b2('bum): mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang
286b3('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar
286b4('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /snying rje chen po glang
286b5('bum): yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i
286b6('bum): chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig po'o//'grib
286b7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang
287a1('bum): yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa
287a2('bum): dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rang byang chub gang yin pa dang /gnyis
287a3('bum): su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid
287a4('bum): med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//'grib pa gang yin pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa
287a5('bum): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs
287a6('bum): med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam grangs des na/gzugs kyi 'grib pa
287a7('bum): gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/'du shes kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'du shes ma yin/'du byed kyi 'grib pa
287b1('bum): gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/mig gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mig ma yin/rna ba'i 'grib pa gang yin/
287b2('bum): pade 'dra rna ba ma yin/sna'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sna ma yin/lce'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang skye ma yin/lus kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin/yid kyi 'grib pa
287b3('bum): gang yin pa de'ang yid ma yin/gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sgra ma yin/dri'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dri ma yin//
287b4('bum): ro'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ro ma yin/reg gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang reg ma yin/chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa
287b5('bum): gang yin pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin/
287b6('bum): pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de 'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang
287b7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang
288a1('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa
288a2('bum): de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus
288a3('bum): te reg pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang
288a4('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/sna'i
288a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa
288a6('bum): de'ang lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma
288a7('bum): yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa
288b1('bum): ngo'ang sa'i khams ma yin/chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chu'i khams mA yin/me'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mo'i khams ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi 'grib
288b2('bum): pa gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma yin/nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang
288b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin/'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i
288b4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ong ming dang gzugs ma yin/skye mchod drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa
288b5('bum): de'ang skye mched drug ma yin/reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin/tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin//
288b6('bum): len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang len pa ma yin/snying pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang srid pa ma yin/skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin/rga shi'i 'grib pa gang
288b7('bum): yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang
289a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
289a2('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de 'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes
289a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib
289a4('bum): ba gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa 'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid
289a5('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin//
289a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/mtha'
289a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang thog ma dang tha ma
289b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma/
289b2('bum): yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong
289b3('bum): pa nyid ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa
289b4('bum): stong pa nyid ma yini/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med
289b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin
289b6('bum): pade'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dbang
289b7('bum): po rnams ma yin/stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin//
290a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa
290a2('bum): de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin/tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshad med
290a3('bum): pa rnams ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi
290a4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug/
290a5('bum): pa rnams ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
290a6('bum): dang /smon pa med pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ting
290a7('bum): nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang
290b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin//
290b2('bum): pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin/snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen
290b3('bum): po ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'odres pa rnams ma yin/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang thams
290b4('bum): cad shes pa nyid ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa
290b5('bum): de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas
290b6('bum): pa'o//gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di 'du shes zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'dra'i 'du byed ces bya ba de
290b7('bum): ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di mog ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs
291a1('bum): su byas pa'o//gang 'di rna ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di sna zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di
291a2('bum): lce zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di lus zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di yid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i
291a3('bum): grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di sgra zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di dri/
291a4('bum): zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'dri ro zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di reg ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs
291a5('bum): su byas pa'o//gang 'di chos zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas
291a6('bum): pa'o//gang 'di rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su bas
291a7('bum): pa'o//gang 'di lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas
291b1('bum): pa'o//gang 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang
291b2('bum): 'di rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di lce'i 'dus
291b3('bum): te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes
291b4('bum): bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di rna ba'i 'dus te reg
291b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang
291b6('bum): 'di lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i
