292a2('bum): pa'o//gang 'di rlung gi khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//grang 'di nam mkho'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su meng pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di
292a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di ma rig pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gong 'di 'du byed ces
292a4('bum): bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis
292a5('bum): su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grongs su byas
292a6('bum): pa'o//gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di sbed pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di len pa zhes bya ba

292b1('bum): pa'o//gang 'di rga shi zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de na gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di tshul khrims
292b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di brtson
292b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang

292b5('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya
292b6('bum): pab de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis
292b7('bum): su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su

293a7('bum): gang 'di dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su

293b5('bum): 'di gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas/
293b6('bum): pa'o//gang 'di mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
293b7('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang 'di mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//gang

294a7('bum): 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhon ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs/gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam

295a1('bum): ldan pa gyur ti'i bu rnam grangs ngasan/gang 'dimig ces bya ba de ni gnyis su ma pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar na ba'adaguzhanam yin/ma smyos pa'angag na//

296b5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma
296b6('bum): skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/gang 'di mig
296b7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ong gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid
297a1('bum): kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs dus na/gang 'di rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba
297a2('bum): ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg po sna'i
297a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med po'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar lce'i
297a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa/lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
297a5('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/gang 'di lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ong gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang
297a6('bum): gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di lus kyi 'dus
297a7('bum): te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid
297b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su
297b2('bum): byas pa'o//'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/mig
297b3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/gang 'di mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su
297b4('bum): med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/mu skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
297b5('bum): gyis tshor ba/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rna bo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
297b6('bum): zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang
297b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
298a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma
298a2('bum): yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang
298a3('bum): 'di lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes
298a4('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor po/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
298a5('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
298a6('bum): ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes
298a7('bum): pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar
298b1('bum): sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/mi skyes pa nyid kyang sa'i khams sa'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang
298b2('bum): 'dri sa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang chu'i khams
298b3('bum): chu'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di chu'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar me'i khams
298b4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang ma'i khams me'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di
298b5('bum): me'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams
298b6('bum): rlung gi khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rlung gi khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar num
298b7('bum): mkha'i khams kyang gzhan mo yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
299a1('bum): rnam grangs des na/gang 'di nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/
299a2('bum): ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams/rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
299a3('bum): na/grong 'di rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar ma rig pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes
299a4('bum): pa nyid kyang ma rig pa/ma rig pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des ni/gang 'di ma rig pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di
299a5('bum): ltar 'du byed kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'du byed/'du byed nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
299a6('bum): dos na/gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rnam par shes pa'ang gzhon ma yin/ma smyos pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/me skyes pa nyid kyang rnam
299a7('bum): bar shes pa/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs
299b1('bum): su byas pa'o//'di ltar ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa/
299b2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma
299b3('bum): yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang skye mched drug/skye mched drug nyid kyang mi skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med
299b4('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar reg pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang reg pa reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
299b5('bum): rnam grangs des na/gang 'di reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang
299b6('bum): tshor ba/tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar sred pa'ang
299b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang sred pa/sred pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di sred pa zhes
300a1('bum): bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar len pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang len pa/lan
300a2('bum): pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di len pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar srid pa'ang gzhan
300a3('bum): ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang srid pa/srid pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di srid pa
300a4('bum): zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar skye ba'ang gzhan ma yin/mo skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang skye ba/skye ba nyid kyang ma
300a5('bum): skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam blangs des na/gang 'di skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rga shi'ong gzhan ma yin//
300a6('bum): mo skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rga shrI/rga shi nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rga shi zhes bya ba de ni
300a7('bum): gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang smin pa'i pha rol
300b1('bum): tu phyin pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su
300b2('bum): byas pa'o//'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha
300b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o///
300b4('bum): 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa
300b5('bum): ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
300b6('bum): phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang
300b7('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/gang 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol
301a1('bum): tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsdam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
301a2('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di bsamra gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di
301a3('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301a4('bum): pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o///
301a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po go gnyis pa//'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhon ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa
301a6('bum): nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i
301a7('bum): grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/me skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa
301b1('bum): ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma
301b2('bum): skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid
301b3('bum): ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang stong po nyid stong pa nyid//
301b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su medo pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di
301b5('bum): ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhon ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid/chen po stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
301b6('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su mod pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes
301b7('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gong
302a1('bum): 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma
302a2('bum): yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di 'dus byas stong pa
302a3('bum): nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang
302a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni
302a5('bum): gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar mtha' los 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang mtha' las
302a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di mtha' las 'ongs pa stong pa nyid ces bya
302a7('bum): ba da ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid
302b1('bum): kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di thog ma dang tha ma med pa
302b2('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/me skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang
302b3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des ni/gong 'di dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis
302b4('bum): su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/rang
302b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
302b6('bum): 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
302b7('bum): ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des ni/gang 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar
303a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/rang gi mtshan nyid
303a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
303a3('bum): 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/
303a4('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar
303a5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes
303a6('bum): pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar ngo bo nyid
303a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mo skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa
303b1('bum): shU ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/grang 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
303b2('bum): yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa/
303b3('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang
303b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
303b5('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma yin//
303b6('bum): ma skyes pa'adra gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
303b7('bum): na/gang 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan
304a1('bum): ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang
304a2('bum): 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes
304a3('bum): panyid kyang dbang po rnams/dbang po rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di dbang po rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med
304a4('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhon ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang stobs rnams/stobs rnams kyang ma
304a5('bum): skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di stobs rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar byang chub kyi
304a6('bum): yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa
304a7('bum): ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar
304b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/'phags pa'i lam
304b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'ang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'od 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med
304b3('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa
304b4('bum): rnams/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnamo grangs des na/gang 'ad 'phags po'i bden pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni
304b5('bum): gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltor bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/me skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsam gau tan rnams//
304b6('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di bsam gtan rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs
304b7('bum): su byas pa'o//'di ltar ro tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshod med pa rnams/tshad med pa
305a1('bum): rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di tshad med pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di
305a2('bum): ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
305a3('bum): rnams/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/gang 'di gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
305a4('bum): rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar
305a5('bum): pa rnams/rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs ngas na/gang 'di rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o///
305a6('bum): 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
305a7('bum): 'jug pa rnams/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/gang 'di mthar gyis
305b1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
305b2('bum): pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rnam
305b3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rnam par thar
305b4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyang
305b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA
305b6('bum): radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma
305b7('bum): yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/cha dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
306a1('bum): des na/gang 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes
306a2('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di
306a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang
306a4('bum): gzhan ma yin te/mA skyes pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu rnam
306a5('bum): grangs des na/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan mo
306a6('bum): yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
306a7('bum): des na/gang 'di mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes
306b1('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
306b2('bum): na/gang 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar byams pa chen po'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan
306b3('bum): ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po/byams pa chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di byams po chen po zhes bya
306b4('bum): byab de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar snying rje chen po'ang gzhon ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po/snying rje chen
306b5('bum): po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos
306b6('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/mi skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang
306b7('bum): ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di//
307a1('bum): ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/rgyun du
307a2('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs
307a3('bum): su byas pa'o//'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu//
307a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan par shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni
307a5('bum): gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'dri ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/mu skyes pa nyid kyang phyir mi
307a6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba
307a7('bum): de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa
307b1('bum): nyid/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des nA/gang 'di dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o///
307b2('bum): 'di ltar rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang byang chub/rang byang chub nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
307b3('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'dri rang byang chub ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang/
307b4('bum): gzhan ma yin te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di
307b5('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin
307b6('bum): te/ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang 'di rnam
307b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
308a1('bum): ldan 'das gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe//
308a2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam
308a3('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/'du shes kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag
308a4('bum): pa'i slad du/rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/mig gi mA skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du
308a5('bum): rna ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sna'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lce'i ma skyes pa mthong bar
308a6('bum): 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lus kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/yid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu
308a7('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sgra'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i/
308b1('bum): rmad du/dri'i mo skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ro'i mi skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/reg gi ma skyes pa mthong bar
308b2('bum): 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes po mthong bar 'gyur
308b3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar
308b4('bum): 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes
308b5('bum): pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/mig gi 'dus te
308b6('bum): reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sna
308b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
309a1('bum): srang du/lus kyi 'dus te dag pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu/
309a2('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par drag pa'i slad du/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
309a3('bum): tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag
309a4('bum): pa'i slad du/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyeni gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor dwa'i ma skyes
309a5('bum): pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par drag pa'i slad du//
309a6('bum): sa'i khams kyi mo skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par drag pa'i slad du/chu'i khams kyi ma skyes po mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/mi'i
309a7('bum): khams kyi ma skyes po mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/nam
309b1('bum): mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad
309b2('bum): du/ma rig pa'i mo skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par drag pa'i slad du/'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rnam par
309b3('bum): shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ming dang gzugs kyi mo skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/skye
309b4('bum): mched drug gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/tshor ba'i ma skyes pa
309b5('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par drag pa'i slad du/sred pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/len pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin
309b6('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/srid pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dgra ba'i slad du/skye ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad
309b7('bum): du/rga shi'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes po mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du//
310a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
310a2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma
310a3('bum): skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/nang stong pa
310a4('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/phyi nang stong pa
310a5('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/chen po/
310a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du//
310a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par
310b1('bum): dag pa'i slad du/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar
310b2('bum): 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
310b3('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rang gi mtshan nyid sbyong
310b4('bum): pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/mi dmigs po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dngos
310b5('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad
310b6('bum): du/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur//
310b7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes
311a1('bum): pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/stobs
311a2('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
311a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur//
311a4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/tshad med pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar
311a5('bum): 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rnam
311a6('bum): par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar
311a7('bum): 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam
311b1('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu
311b2('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa
311b3('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/so so yang dag par rig pa
311b4('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/snying rje
311b5('bum): chen po'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag
311b6('bum): pa'i slad du/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur//
311b7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/so so'i skye bo'i ma skyes pa
312a1('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par drag pa'i slad du/
312a2('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag
312a3('bum): po'i slad du/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag po'i skad du/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar
312a4('bum): 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/phyir mi 'ong ba'i me skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag po'i slad du/phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi ma skyes pa
312a5('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dgra bcom pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi
312a6('bum): ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rang sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rang
312a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam
312b1('bum): par dag pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dra pa'i chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/shin tu rnam par/
312b2('bum): dag pa'i slad du/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//bdag gis tshe
312b3('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don shes pa ltar na/gzugs kyang ma skyes la/tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa/'du shes kyang ma skyes pa/'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/rnam par
312b4('bum): shes pa'ang ma smyos pa/mig kyang me skyes la/rna ba'ang ma skyes pa/sna 'ong ma skyes pa/lce'ang ma skyes pa/lus kyang ma skyes pa/yid kyang ma skyes po/gzugs kyang ma
312b5('bum): skyes la/sgra 'ong ma skyes pa/dI'ang mo skyes pa/ro'ang ma smyos pa/reg kyang mo skyes pa/chos kyang ma skyes pa/mig gri rnam par shes pa'ang mo skyes la/rna ba'i rnam
312b6('bum): por shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/sna'i rnam por shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/lce'i rnam por shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/yid kyi rnam
312b7('bum): par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes la/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes pa/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes po/lce'i 'dus te reg
313a1('bum): da'ang ma skyes pa/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes pa/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang ma skyes pa/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba'ang ma skye
313a2('bum): la/rna ba'i 'dus te reg po'i rgyun gyis tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'ang mo skyes pa/lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ma skyes
313a3('bum): pa/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa/sa'i khams kyang ma skyes la/chu'i khams
313a4('bum): kyang ma skyes pa/ma'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/rlung gi khoms kyang ma skyes pa/nam mkha'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang ma skyes pa/ma rig
313a5('bum): pa'ang mi skyes la/'du byed kyang ma skyes pa/rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ming dang gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/skye mched drug kyang ma skyes pa/reg pa'ang ma
313a6('bum): skyes pa/tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa/srod pa'ang ma skyes pa/len pa'ang mo skyes pa/srid pa'ang ma skyes pa/skye ba'ang ma skyes pa/rga shi'ang ma skyes pa/sbyin pa'i
313a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma skyes la/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma skyes pa/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma skyes pa/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
313b1('bum): na skyes pa/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma skyes pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma skyes pa/nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes la/phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa//
313b2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/chen po stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
313b3('bum): ma skyes pa/'dus ma byos stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/dor ba meng
313b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/mi dmigs
313b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mo skyes pa/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/dran
313b6('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes la/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa/dbang po rnams kyang ma skyes pa/stobs
313b7('bum): rnams kyang ma skyes pa/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa/'phagos pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang ma skyes pa/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma skyes
314a1('bum): la/bsdam gtan bzhi'ang ma skyes pa/tshad med pa bzhi'ang ma skyes pa/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang ma skyes pa/rnam par thar pa
314a2('bum): brgyad kyang ma skyes pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang ma skyes pa/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med po dang /smon pa med pa'ang
314a3('bum): ma skyes pa/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma skyes pa/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
314a4('bum): bcu'ang ma skyes pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang mo skyes pa/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang ma skyes pa/byams pa chen po'ang ma skyes pa/snying rje chen po'ang ma skyes
314a5('bum): pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud kyang mi skyes pa/thams cad shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/rnam pa thams cad
314a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa/so so'i skye bo'ang ma skyes pa/so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/rgyun du zhugs pa'ang ma skyes pa/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma
314a7('bum): skyes pa/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang ma skyes pa/lon cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/phyir mi 'ong ba'ang ma skyes pa/phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/dgra
314b1('bum): bcom pa'ang ma skyes pa/dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes pa/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa/byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes
314b2('bum): pa/byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes pa/sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin na/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar gal te//
314b3('bum): gzugs kyang skye ba med la/tshor ba'ang skye ba med/'du shes kyang skyo ba med/'du byed kyang skye ba med/rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med/mig kyang skye ba med la/rma
314b4('bum): ba'ang skye ba med/sna'ang skye ba med/lce 'ong skye ba med/lus kyang skyo ba med/yid kyang skye ba med/gzugs kyang skye ba med la/sgra'ang skye ba med/dri'ang skye ba med//
314b5('bum): ro'ong skyo ba med/reg kyang skye ba med/chos kyang skye ba med/mig go rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med la/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang skyo ba med/sna'i rnam par
314b6('bum): shes po'ang skye ba med/lho'i rnam par shes pa'ong skye ba med/lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'od skye ba med/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med/myig gi 'dun
314b7('bum): te reg pa'ang skyo ba med la/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang skye ba med/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang skyo ba med/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang skye ba med/lus kyi 'dus te/
315a1('bum): reg pa'ang skye ba med/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang skye ba med/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang skye ba med la/rna ba'i 'dus te reg
315a2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang skye bo med/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang skye ba med/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang skye ba med/lus kyi 'dus
315a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang skye ba med/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang skye ba med/sa'i khams kyang skye ba med la/chu'i khams kyang skye ba
315a4('bum): med/me'i khams kyang skye ba med/rlung gi khams kyang skye ba med/nam mkha'i khams kyang skye ba med/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang skye ba med/mo rig
315a5('bum): pa'ang skye ba med la/'du byed kyang skye ba med/rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med/ming dang gzugs kyang skye ba med/skye mched drug kyang skye ba med/reg pa'ang skye ba med/
315a6('bum): tshor ba'ang skye ba med/sred pa'ang skye ba med/len pa'ang skye ba med/srid pa'ang skye ba med/skye ba'ang skye ba med/rga shi'ang skye bo med/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
315a7('bum): pa'ang skye ba med la/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang skye ba med/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang skye bo med/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang skye ba med//
315b1('bum): babasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang skye ba med/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang skye ba med/nang stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med la/phyi stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/phyi nang stong pa nyid
315b2('bum): kyang skye ba med/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/chen po stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang skye ba meng /'dus
315b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang skye ba mang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/dor ba med pa stong po nyid kyang skye ba
315b4('bum): med/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye bo med/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba
315b5('bum): memang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba med/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
315b6('bum): kyang skye ba med la/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang skye ba med/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang skye ba med/dbang po rnams kyang skye ba med/stobs rnams kyang skye ba med//
315b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang skye ba med/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang skye ba med/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang skye ba med la/bsam gtan
316a1('bum): rnams kyang skye ba med/tshad med pa rnams kyang skye ba med/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang skye ba med/rnam par thar pa rnams kyang
316a2('bum): skye ba med/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang skye ba med/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mo med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang skye
316a3('bum): bo med/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang skye ba med/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang skye ba med/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang skye ba med/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
316a4('bum): rnams kyang skye ba med/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang skye ba med/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dra skye ba med/byams pa chen po'ang skye ba med/snying rje chen
316a5('bum): po'ang skye ba med/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba med/thams cad shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med la/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med
316a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med la/so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skyo ba med/rgyun du zhugs pa'ang skye ba med/rgyun du
316a7('bum): zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/lon cig phyir 'ong ba'ang skye ba med/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye bo med/phyir mi 'ong ba'ang skye ba med/phyir mi 'ong
316b1('bum): ba'i chos kyang bye ba med/dgra bcom pa'ang skye ba med/dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/rang sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med/byung
316b2('bum): chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med/byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med/sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skyo ba med na ni/nyon thos kyi theg pa
316b3('bum): pa rnams kyis kyang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur
316b4('bum): ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /rnam
316b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro//'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha mi dad par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /byang chub rnam
316b6('bum): pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te/chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na/ci'i phyir na/rgyun du zhugs pas ni/kun tu sbyor ba gsum
316b7('bum): spong ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgoms/phyir mi 'ong bas ni/dam pa
317a1('bum): ma yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms
317a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni/rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms/ci'i phyir na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/sems can rnams
317a3('bum): kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/ci'i phyir na/de bzhin gshegs pas ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
317a4('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par srungs rgyas/ci'i phyir na/de bzhin gshogs pas ni/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
317a5('bum): gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang /khong du chud pa yod
317a6('bum): par mi 'dod do//me skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do//rgyun du zhugs po'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do//mi skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par
317a7('bum): mi 'dod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do//ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do//
317b1('bum): maskyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par mi 'dod do//dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par mi 'dod do//ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do//rang byang
317b2('bum): chu bo yod par mi 'dod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod par yang mi 'dod do//
317b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA r-i dwa ti'i bu/sdug bsngal gyi 'du
317b4('bum): shes bskyed na/sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus kyi/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sems can rnams le mer 'du shes bskyad pa dang /
317b5('bum): par 'du shes bskyed pa dang /bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang /bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas/sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don bya ba de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
317b6('bum): tshul du nus par 'gyur ro//byang chub snga mas dpo' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya'ang /de ni thams cad du thams
317b7('bum): cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa/de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams lo'ang 'du shes bskyed de/de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i
318a1('bum): 'du shes mi bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar do ni chos gang yang mi len mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bdag ni ma
318a2('bum): skyes pa la/de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'dod de/de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor
318a3('bum): lo bskor ba ltar na ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa 'am/'thob par bya ba mi 'dod do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos skyes pas thob pa dang /'thob par
318a4('bum): bya bar 'dod dam/'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob
318a5('bum): par mi 'dod do//ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na 'thob pa med pa la mngon par rtogs pa med dam/rab 'byor
318a6('bum): gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'thob pa'ang yod/mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod de/gnyis kyis ma yin gyi/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'thob pa
318a7('bum): 'am mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/dgra bcom pa 'am/
318b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas sam/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/sangs rgyas dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/don dam par ni 'thob pa 'am/mngon par rtogs pa 'am rgyun
318b2('bum): du zhugs pa 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/dgra bcom pa'am/rang sangs rgyas sam/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/sangs rgyas su gdugaso
318b3('bum): pa med do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa/de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha
318b4('bum): skad du tha dad kyi don dam par ma yin nam/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de de bzhin te/ji ltar thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha
318b5('bum): snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi don dam par ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/don dam par ni
318b6('bum): las kyang med/las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med/skye ba'ang med/'gag pa'ang med/kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/rnam par byang ba'ang med do//smras pa tshe dang
318b7('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram/'on tam skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/bdag ni ma
319a1('bum): skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do//skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar mi 'dod pa

325b5('bum): pa skyes pa reng bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu/bdag ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
